member.name: T:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection
member.summary: Provides support for determining if a specific version of the .NET Framework runtime is installed and the service pack level for the runtime version.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetExactVersion(Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersion)
member.overloads: Retrieves the exact version number for the specified .NET Framework or Foundation Library.
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the specified .NET Framework version.
member.param: The .NET Framework whose version should be retrieved.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the specified .NET Framework version. If the specified .NET Framework version is not found, a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetExactVersion(Cadru.Environment.WindowsFoundationLibrary)
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the specified .NET Framework Foundation Library.
member.param: The Foundation Library whose version should be retrieved.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the specified .NET Framework Foundation Library. If the specified .NET Framework Foundation Library is not found, a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetServicePackLevel(Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersion)
member.overloads: Retrieves the service pack level for the specified .NET Framework or Foundation Library.
member.summary: Retrieves the service pack level for the specified .NET Framework version.
member.param: The .NET Framework whose service pack level should be retrieved.
member.returns: An integer value representing the service pack level for the specified .NET Framework version. If the specified .NET Framework version is not found, -1 is returned.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetServicePackLevel(Cadru.Environment.WindowsFoundationLibrary)
member.summary: Retrieves the service pack level for the specified .NET Framework Foundation Library.
member.param: The Foundation Library whose service pack level should be retrieved.
member.returns: An integer value representing the service pack level for the specified .NET Framework Foundation Library. If the specified .NET Framework Foundation Library is not found, -1 is returned.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.IsInstalled(Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersion)
member.overloads: Determines if the specified .NET Framework or Foundation Library is installed on the local computer.
member.summary: Determines if the specified .NET Framework version is installed on the local computer.
member.param: The version of the .NET Framework to test.
member.returns: if the specified .NET Framework version is installed; otherwise .

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.IsInstalled(Cadru.Environment.WindowsFoundationLibrary)
member.summary: Determines if the specified .NET Framework Foundation Library is installed on the local computer.
member.param: The Foundation Library to test.
member.returns: if the specified .NET Framework Foundation Library is installed; otherwise .

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.CheckFxVersion(Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersion)
member.summary: Retrieves the .NET Framework version number from the registry and validates that it is not a pre-release version number.
member.param: The version of the .NET Framework to test.
member.returns: if the build number is greater than the requested version; otherwise .

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetCoreFrameworkVersion(Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersion,System.Version@)
member.summary: Gets a value which indicates if the version of the specified .NET Framework could be determined.
member.param: The version of the .NET Framework to test.
The version number of the Framework.
member.returns: if the version could be determined; otherwise .

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetCorePath(Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersion)
member.summary: Gets the path to a DLL which represents a core component of the .NET Framework.
member.param: The version of the .NET Framework to test.
member.returns: The fully qualified path to the core component DLL for the specified .NET Framework.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetInstallRoot
member.summary: Gets the installation root path for the .NET Framework.
member.returns: A representing the installation root path for the .NET Framework.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx10ExactVersion
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the .NET Framework 1.0.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the .NET Framework 1.0 or a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number if the .NET Framework 1.0 is not found.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx10SPLevel
member.summary: Detects the service pack level for the .NET Framework 1.0.
member.returns: An representing the service pack level for the .NET Framework.
member.devdoc: Uses the detection method recommended at http://blogs.msdn.com/astebner/archive/2004/09/14/229802.aspx to determine what service pack for the .NET Framework 1.0 is installed on the machine.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx11ExactVersion
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the .NET Framework 1.1.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the .NET Framework 1.1 or a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number if the .NET Framework 1.1 is not found.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx20ExactVersion
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the .NET Framework 2.0.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the .NET Framework 2.0 or a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number if the .NET Framework 2.0 is not found.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx30CardSpaceExactVersion
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the .NET Framework 3.0 CardSpace.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the .NET Framework 3.0 CardSpace or a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number if the .NET Framework 3.0 CardSpace is not found.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx30CardSpaceSPLevel
member.summary: Detects the service pack level for the .NET Framework 3.0 CardSpace.
member.returns: An representing the service pack level for the .NET Framework 3.0 CardSpace.
member.remarks: It doesn't appear that the Windows Foundation Libraries are serviced independently of the .NET Framework 3.0, so this returns the .NET Framework 3.0 service pack level.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx30WCFExactVersion
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the .NET Framework 3.0 WCF.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the .NET Framework 3.0 WCF or a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number if the .NET Framework 3.0 WCF is not found.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx30WCFSPLevel
member.summary: Detects the service pack level for the .NET Framework 3.0 WCF.
member.returns: An representing the service pack level for the .NET Framework 3.0 WCF.
member.remarks: It doesn't appear that the Windows Foundation Libraries are serviced independently of the .NET Framework 3.0, so this returns the .NET Framework 3.0 service pack level.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx30WFExactVersion
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the .NET Framework 3.0 WF.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the .NET Framework 3.0 WF or a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number if the .NET Framework 3.0 WF is not found.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx30WFSPLevel
member.summary: Detects the service pack level for the .NET Framework 3.0 WF.
member.returns: An representing the service pack level for the .NET Framework 3.0 WF.
member.remarks: It doesn't appear that the Windows Foundation Libraries are serviced independently of the .NET Framework 3.0, so this returns the .NET Framework 3.0 service pack level.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx30WPFExactVersion
member.summary: Retrieves the exact version number for the .NET Framework 3.0 WPF.
member.returns: A version representing the exact version number for the .NET Framework 3.0 WPF or a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number if the .NET Framework 3.0 WPF is not found.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfx30WPFSPLevel
member.summary: Detects the service pack level for the .NET Framework 3.0 WOF.
member.returns: An representing the service pack level for the .NET Framework 3.0 WPF.
member.remarks: It doesn't appear that the Windows Foundation Libraries are serviced independently of the .NET Framework 3.0, so this returns the .NET Framework 3.0 service pack level.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfxExactVersion(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the .NET Framework version number from the registry.
member.param: The registry key name.
The registry value name.
member.returns: A that represents the .NET Framework version or a is returned that represents a 0.0.0.0 version number if the .NET Framework version is not found.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetNetfxSPLevel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Detects the service pack level for a version of .NET Framework.
member.param: The registry key name.
The registry value name.
member.returns: An representing the service pack level for the .NET Framework.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetRegistryKey(Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersion)
member.summary: Gets the registry key for the given .NET Framework version and (optionally) profile.
member.param: The version of the .NET Framework.
member.returns: A string representing the registry key for the given .NET Framework version and profile.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersionDetection.GetRegistryValue``1(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind,``0@)
member.summary: Gets a value which indicates if the specified registry value was found.
member.typeparam: The type of the stored registry value.
member.param: The top-level registry hive to open.
The specified sub key to open.
The name of the value to retrieve.
The registry data type of the specified value.
The data associated with the registry hive, key, and value name.
member.returns: if the registry value was found; otherwise, .

member.name: T:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesDetection
member.summary: Provides support for determining if a specific version of the .NET Framework runtime is installed and the service pack level for the runtime version.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesDetection.IsAspNetRegistered(Cadru.Environment.FrameworkVersion)
member.summary: Determines if the version of ASP.NET is registered with Internet Information Services (IIS) on the local computer.
member.param: One of the values.
member.returns: if the specified ASP.NET version is registered; otherwise .

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesDetection.IsAspRegistered
member.summary: Determines if ASP is registered with Internet Information Services (IIS) on the local computer.
member.returns: if ASP is registered; otherwise .

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesDetection.IsInstalled(Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesVersion)
member.summary: Determines if the specified version of Internet Information Services (IIS) is installed on the local computer.
member.param: One of the values.
member.returns: if the specified Internet Information Services version is installed; otherwise .

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesDetection.IsInstalled(Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesSubcomponent)
member.summary: Determines if the specified Internet Information Services (IIS) subcomponent is installed on the local computer.
member.param: One of the values.
member.returns: if the specified Internet Information Services subcomponent is installed; otherwise .
member.remarks: Subcomponents only apply to IIS versions 6 and earlier.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesDetection.IsInstalled(Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesFeature)
member.summary: Determines if the specified Internet Information Services (IIS) feature is installed and enabled on the local computer.
member.param: One of the values.
member.returns: if the specified Internet Information Services feature is installed; otherwise .
member.remarks: Features only apply to IIS versions 7 and later.

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesDetection.GetInstalledVersion
member.summary: Gets the installed IIS version.
member.returns: A representing the installed IIS version or a representing 0.0.0.0 if IIS is not installed.

member.summary: Gets a value which indicates if the specified registry value was found.
member.typeparam: The type of the stored registry value.

The specified sub key to open.
The name of the value to retrieve.
The registry data type of the specified value.
The data associated with the registry hive, key, and value name.
member.returns: if the registry value was found; otherwise, .

member.summary: Detects if the specified feature is installed.

member.returns: if the feature is installed; otherwise .

member.name: M:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesDetection.IsFeatureInstalled(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Detects if the specified features are installed.

member.summary: Detects if the specified features are installed.

member.name: T:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesVersion
member.summary: Specifies the Internet Information Services (IIS) versions.

item.description: Included with Windows NT 3.51 SP 3 (or as a self-contained download).
Included with Windows NT Server 4.0 Service Pack 3 (Internet Information Server 2.0 is automatically upgraded to Internet Information Server 3.0 during the install of SP3).
Self-contained download from www.microsoft.com or the Windows NT Option Pack compact disc.
Windows NT Server 4.0 SP3 and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01
Built-in component of Windows XP Professional.
Built-in component of Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008.
Built-in component of Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.
Built-in component of Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesVersion.IIS1
member.summary: Internet Information Services 1.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesVersion.IIS2
member.summary: Internet Information Services 2.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesVersion.IIS3
member.summary: Internet Information Services 3.0.

member.summary: Internet Information Services 4.0.

member.summary: Internet Information Services 5.1.

member.summary: Internet Information Services 6.0.

member.summary: Internet Information Services 7.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InternetInformationServicesVersion.IIS75

member.name: T:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.Constants
member.summary: An internal class that defines the p/invoke constants required by the Win32 API calls that are used inside the library.

member.name: T:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric
member.summary: Flags used with the GetSystemMetrics function.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXSCREEN
member.summary: Width of the screen of the primary display monitor, in pixels. This is the same values obtained by calling GetDeviceCaps as follows: GetDeviceCaps( hdcPrimaryMonitor, HORZRES).

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYSCREEN
member.summary: Height of the screen of the primary display monitor, in pixels. This is the same values obtained by calling GetDeviceCaps as follows: GetDeviceCaps( hdcPrimaryMonitor, VERTRES).

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYVSCROLL
member.summary: Width of a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXVSCROLL
member.summary: Height of a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYCAPTION
member.summary: Height of a caption area, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXBORDER
member.summary: Width of a window border, in pixels. This is equivalent to the SM_CXEDGE value for windows with the 3-D look.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYBORDER
member.summary: Height of a window border, in pixels. This is equivalent to the SM_CYEDGE value for windows with the 3-D look.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXDLGFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the frame around the perimeter of a window that has a caption but is not sizable, in pixels. SM_CXFIXEDFRAME is the height of the horizontal border and SM_CYFIXEDFRAME is the width of the vertical border.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYDLGFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the frame around the perimeter of a window that has a caption but is not sizable, in pixels. SM_CXFIXEDFRAME is the height of the horizontal border and SM_CYFIXEDFRAME is the width of the vertical border.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYVTHUMB
member.summary: Height of the thumb box in a vertical scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXHTHUMB
member.summary: Width of the thumb box in a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXICON
member.summary: Default width of an icon, in pixels. The LoadIcon function can load only icons with the dimensions specified by SM_CXICON and SM_CYICON.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYICON
member.summary: Default height of an icon, in pixels. The LoadIcon function can load only icons with the dimensions SM_CXICON and SM_CYICON.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXCURSOR
member.summary: Width of a cursor, in pixels. The system cannot create cursors of other sizes.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYCURSOR
member.summary: Height of a cursor, in pixels. The system cannot create cursors of other sizes.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENU
member.summary: Height of a single-line menu bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXFULLSCREEN
member.summary: Width of the client area for a full-screen window on the primary display monitor, in pixels. To get the coordinates of the portion of the screen not obscured by the system taskbar or by application desktop toolbars, call the SystemParametersInfo function with the SPI_GETWORKAREA value.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYFULLSCREEN
member.summary: Height of the client area for a full-screen window on the primary display monitor, in pixels. To get the coordinates of the portion of the screen not obscured by the system taskbar or by application desktop toolbars, call the SystemParametersInfo function with the SPI_GETWORKAREA value.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYKANJIWINDOW
member.summary: For double byte character set versions of the system, this is the height of the Kanji window at the bottom of the screen, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_MOUSEWHEELPRESENT
member.summary: Nonzero if a mouse with a wheel is installed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYHSCROLL
member.summary: Height of the arrow bitmap on a vertical scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXHSCROLL
member.summary: Width of the arrow bitmap on a horizontal scroll bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_DEBUG
member.summary: Nonzero if the debug version of User.exe is installed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_SWAPBUTTON
member.summary: Nonzero if the left and right mouse buttons are reversed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED1
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED2
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED3
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_RESERVED4
member.summary: Reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXMIN
member.summary: Minimum width of a window, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMIN
member.summary: Minimum height of a window, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXSIZE
member.summary: Width of a button in a window's caption or title bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYSIZE
member.summary: Height of a button in a window's caption or title bar, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the sizing border around the perimeter of a window that can be resized, in pixels. SM_CXSIZEFRAME is the width of the horizontal border, and SM_CYSIZEFRAME is the height of the vertical border.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYFRAME
member.summary: Thickness of the sizing border around the perimeter of a window that can be resized, in pixels. SM_CXSIZEFRAME is the width of the horizontal border, and SM_CYSIZEFRAME is the height of the vertical border.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINTRACK
member.summary: Minimum tracking width of a window, in pixels. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size smaller than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINTRACK
member.summary: Minimum tracking height of a window, in pixels. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size smaller than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXDOUBLECLK
member.summary: Width of the rectangle around the location of a first click in a double-click sequence, in pixels. The second click must occur within the rectangle defined by SM_CXDOUBLECLK and SM_CYDOUBLECLK for the system to consider the two clicks a double-click.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYDOUBLECLK
member.summary: Height of the rectangle around the location of a first click in a double-click sequence, in pixels. The second click must occur within the rectangle defined by SM_CXDOUBLECLK and SM_CYDOUBLECLK for the system to consider the two clicks a double-click. The two clicks must also occur within a specified time.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXICONSPACING
member.summary: Width of a grid cell for items in large icon view, in pixels. Each item fits into a rectangle of size SM_CXICONSPACING by SM_CYICONSPACING when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CXICON.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYICONSPACING
member.summary: Height of a grid cell for items in large icon view, in pixels. Each item fits into a rectangle of size SM_CXICONSPACING by SM_CYICONSPACING when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CYICON.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_MENUDROPALIGNMENT
member.summary: Nonzero if drop-down menus are right-aligned with the corresponding menu-bar item; zero if the menus are left-aligned.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_PENWINDOWS
member.summary: Nonzero if the Microsoft Windows for Pen computing extensions are installed; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_DBCSENABLED
member.summary: Nonzero if User32.dll supports DBCS; zero otherwise. (WinMe/95/98): Unicode.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CMOUSEBUTTONS
member.summary: Number of buttons on mouse, or zero if no mouse is installed.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXFIXEDFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYFIXEDFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXSIZEFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYSIZEFRAME
member.summary: Identical Values Changed After Windows NT 4.0.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_SECURE
member.summary: Nonzero if security is present; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXEDGE
member.summary: Width of a 3-D border, in pixels. This is the 3-D counterpart of SM_CXBORDER.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYEDGE
member.summary: Height of a 3-D border, in pixels. This is the 3-D counterpart of SM_CYBORDER.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINSPACING
member.summary: Width of a grid cell for a minimized window, in pixels. Each minimized window fits into a rectangle this size when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CXMINIMIZED.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINSPACING
member.summary: Height of a grid cell for a minimized window, in pixels. Each minimized window fits into a rectangle this size when arranged. This value is always greater than or equal to SM_CYMINIMIZED.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXSMICON
member.summary: Recommended width of a small icon, in pixels. Small icons typically appear in window captions and in small icon view.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMICON
member.summary: Recommended height of a small icon, in pixels. Small icons typically appear in window captions and in small icon view.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMCAPTION
member.summary: Height of a small caption, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXSMSIZE
member.summary: Width of small caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYSMSIZE
member.summary: Height of small caption buttons, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXMENUSIZE
member.summary: Width of menu bar buttons, such as the child window close button used in the multiple document interface, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENUSIZE
member.summary: Height of menu bar buttons, such as the child window close button used in the multiple document interface, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_ARRANGE
member.summary: Flags specifying how the system arranged minimized windows.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXMINIMIZED
member.summary: Width of a minimized window, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMINIMIZED
member.summary: Height of a minimized window, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXMAXTRACK
member.summary: Default maximum width of a window that has a caption and sizing borders, in pixels. This metric refers to the entire desktop. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size larger than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMAXTRACK
member.summary: Default maximum height of a window that has a caption and sizing borders, in pixels. This metric refers to the entire desktop. The user cannot drag the window frame to a size larger than these dimensions. A window can override this value by processing the WM_GETMINMAXINFO message.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXMAXIMIZED
member.summary: Default width, in pixels, of a maximized top-level window on the primary display monitor.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMAXIMIZED
member.summary: Default height, in pixels, of a maximized top-level window on the primary display monitor.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_NETWORK
member.summary: Least significant bit is set if a network is present; otherwise, it is cleared. The other bits are reserved for future use.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CLEANBOOT
member.summary: Value that specifies how the system was started: 0-normal, 1-failsafe, 2-failsafe /w net.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXDRAG
member.summary: Width of a rectangle centered on a drag point to allow for limited movement of the mouse pointer before a drag operation begins, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYDRAG
member.summary: Height of a rectangle centered on a drag point to allow for limited movement of the mouse pointer before a drag operation begins. This value is in pixels. It allows the user to click and release the mouse button easily without unintentionally starting a drag operation.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_SHOWSOUNDS
member.summary: Nonzero if the user requires an application to present information visually in situations where it would otherwise present the information only in audible form; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXMENUCHECK
member.summary: Width of the default menu check-mark bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYMENUCHECK
member.summary: Height of the default menu check-mark bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_SLOWMACHINE
member.summary: Nonzero if the computer has a low-end (slow) processor; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_MIDEASTENABLED
member.summary: Nonzero if the system is enabled for Hebrew and Arabic languages, zero if not.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_MOUSEPRESENT
member.summary: Nonzero if a mouse is installed; zero otherwise. This value is rarely zero, because of support for virtual mice and because some systems detect the presence of the port instead of the presence of a mouse.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Coordinate of the top of the virtual screen.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Coordinate of the left of the virtual screen.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Width of the virtual screen.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN
member.summary: Windows 2000 (v5.0+) Height of the virtual screen.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CMONITORS
member.summary: Number of display monitors on the desktop.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_SAMEDISPLAYFORMAT
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if all the display monitors have the same color format, zero otherwise. Note that two displays can have the same bit depth, but different color formats. For example, the red, green, and blue pixels can be encoded with different numbers of bits, or those bits can be located in different places in a pixel's color value.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_IMMENABLED
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if Input Method Manager/Input Method Editor features are enabled; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CXFOCUSBORDER
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Width of the left and right edges of the focus rectangle drawn by DrawFocusRect. This value is in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CYFOCUSBORDER
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Height of the top and bottom edges of the focus rectangle drawn by DrawFocusRect. This value is in pixels.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_TABLETPC
member.summary: Nonzero if the current operating system is the Windows XP Tablet PC edition, zero if not.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_MEDIACENTER
member.summary: Nonzero if the current operating system is the Windows XP, Media Center Edition, zero if not.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_OTHER
member.summary: Metrics Other.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_2000
member.summary: Metrics Windows 2000.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_CMETRICS_NT
member.summary: Metrics Windows NT.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_REMOTESESSION
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) This system metric is used in a Terminal Services environment. If the calling process is associated with a Terminal Services client session, the return value is nonzero. If the calling process is associated with the Terminal Server console session, the return value is zero. The console session is not necessarily the physical console - see WTSGetActiveConsoleSessionId for more information.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_SHUTTINGDOWN
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) Nonzero if the current session is shutting down; zero otherwise.

member.name: F:Cadru.Environment.InteropServices.SystemMetric.SM_REMOTECONTROL
member.summary: Windows XP (v5.1+) This system metric is used in a Terminal Services environment. Its value is nonzero if the current session is remotely controlled; zero otherwise.

member.name: T:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.ApplicationExcpetion_UnableToDetermineInstallRoot
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to determine the install root path for the .NET Framework..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Argument_EnumIllegalVal
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Illegal enum value: {0}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value '{0}' is not valid for this usage of the type {1}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Value of flags is invalid..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Argument_InvalidIndexValuesString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The starting index and ending index refer to the same location in the string..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Argument_MustBeAttribute
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument must be an Attribute or derived from an Attribute..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Argument_MustBeDateTime
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Object must be of type DateTime..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument must be an IsoDateTime..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Argument_MustBeString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Object must be of type String..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Argument_NotSerializable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument passed in is not serializable..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Argument_StartIndexGreaterThanEndIndexString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The starting index refers to a location in the string that is after the ending index..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Argument_StringZeroLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to String cannot be of zero length..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.ArgumentExceptionMustBeEnum
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type provided must be an Enum..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.ArgumentNull_String
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to String reference not set to an instance of a String..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexLessThanLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Index must be less than the length of string..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexLessThanZero
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Index must be non-negative..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the length of the string..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.ArgumentOutOfRange_Range
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Valid values are between {0} and {1}, inclusive..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.DownloadInfoConnectionClosed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not download {0} - FTP server closed the connection..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.DownloadInfoInvalidResponseReceived
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not download {0} - a web page was returned from the web server..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.FileDownloaderCancelled
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Download was cancelled..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.FileDownloaderDownloadLocation
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Downloading file to {0}..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_BadDatePattern
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not determine the order of year, month, and date from '{0}'..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_BadDateTime
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to String was not recognized as a valid DateTime..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_BadDateTimeCalendar
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DateTime represented by the string is not supported in calendar {0}..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_BadDayOfWeek
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to String was not recognized as a valid DateTime because the day of week was incorrect..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_BadFormatSpecifier
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Format specifier was invalid..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_BadQuote
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot find a matching quote character for the character '{0}'..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_DateOutOfRange
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DateTime represented by the string is out of range..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_Dns_Bad_Ip_Address
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An invalid IP address was specified..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_EmptyInputString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Input string was either empty or contained only white space..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_ExtraJunkAtEnd

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_InvalidLen

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_InvalidString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Input string was not in a correct format..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_NeedSingleChar

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.Format_RepeatDateTimePattern
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DateTime pattern '{0}' appears more than once with different values..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The String being parsed cannot contain two TimeZone specifiers..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The string was not recognized as a valid DateTime. There is a unknown word starting at index {0}..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.InvalidCast_FromTo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid cast from '{0}' to '{1}'..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.MDA_InvalidFormatForLocal
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot apply format "{0}" to the date "{1}" as the date is already in local time..

member.name: P:Cadru.Environment.Resources.Strings.MDA_InvalidFormatForUtc
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot apply format "{0}" to the date "{1}" as the date is already in universal time..

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.AllowNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that is allowed as an input even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.AllowNullAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DisallowNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that is disallowed as an input even if the corresponding type allows it.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a method that will never return under any circumstance.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method will not return if the associated parameter is passed the specified value.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute.ParameterValue
member.summary: Gets the condition parameter value. Code after the method is considered unreachable by diagnostics if the argument to the associated parameter matches this value.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified parameter value.
member.param: The condition parameter value. Code after the method is considered unreachable by diagnostics if the argument to the associated parameter matches this value.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that an output may be even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that when a method returns , the parameter may be even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter may be .

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter may be .

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have not- values.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with a field or property member.
member.param: The field or property member that is promised to be not-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the list of field and property members.
member.param: The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have non- values when returning with the specified return value condition.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and a field or property member.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be .
The field or property member that is promised to be not-.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String[])

member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be .
The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.
